intro.title: Intro
intro.chests_description: Open boxes and win different prizes from them!
intro.rewards_description: Win Tokens, USDT, More Keys and Upcoming NFTs or Cryptocurrencies!

game.title: Game
game.click_on_box: Click on a box to open it
game.reward_description: Unlock amazing rewards: from coins and USDT to valuable keys for extra reopens. You can open new box every 4 hours!

shop.title: Shop
shop.description: Buy more gems for more actions

friends.title: City fair
friends.description: You can find many friends and admirers at the city fair, but you will have to fork out some money.
friends.complex_baunty: both for you and your friend

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Trials of fate open up many new opportunities and grant prosperity, but they take away vitality.
tasks.login_description: Log in to the app every day to complete this task and track your daily streak. The more days in a row you log in, the bigger the reward!
tasks.open_chest_description: Open any chest on the game board to complete this task and receive a reward.
tasks.share_story_description: Share the game story in Telegram to spread the word and receive tokens. Simply click "Share Story" and let your friends see what you’ve accomplished!
tasks.daily_checkin_description: Contribute a donation to support the community and earn token rewards.
tasks.invite_friends_description: Invite your friends to join the game using your referral link. Complete each level of the task by inviting the specified number of friends and earn increasing rewards.
tasks.connect_wallet_description: Connect your wallet via TON Connect to receive tokens as a reward. Secure your rewards and enjoy all the features of the game!
tasks.make_transaction_description: Connect your wallet via TON Connect to receive tokens as a reward. Secure your rewards and enjoy all the features of the game!
tasks.okx_registration_description: Register on OKX using our referral link and get a reward.
tasks.okx_kyc_description: Complete the KYC verification on OKX and get a reward.
tasks.okx_deposit_description: Make a deposit to your OKX account and get a reward.
tasks.subscribe_channel_description: Subscribe to our Telegram channel and get a reward.

register.step_one: Register on OKX using our referral link:
register.step_two: Then enter your OKX UID in the field  to verify it. If you encounter any difficulties finding your UID, follow these instructions:
register.instruct_one: Log in to your OKX account via the app or website.
register.instruct_two: Go to the "Profile" or "Settings" section (avatar icon).
register.instruct_three: Locate your UID — this is your unique identifier displayed in your profile.
register.input_invalid_id: Please enter a valid UID. The field cannot be empty or contain invalid characters.

verify.subtitle: Complete the KYC on OKX and get a reward
verify.step_one: Log in to your OKX account via the app or website.
verify.step_three: Select "Verification" and follow the steps to complete KYC.
verify.step_four: Return here and click "CHECK" to claim your reward.
verify.check_error: Your KYC verification has failed. Please ensure the accuracy of the provided information and try again.

deposit.subtitle: Make a deposit to your OKX account and get a reward.
deposit.check_error: The deposit has not been verified. Please check your transaction details and contact support if the problem persists.

secret.title: Frontiers
secret.description: A secret place usually gives new impressions, opens up new abilities, brings many gifts, but at what cost?

room.title: Native haven
room.description: A place where you can hide from the cold nights and gain vitality, but it requires care and order.

prisma.title: Fortunes
prisma.description: Magic fortunes will answer any question for gems. Do you have them with you?

bawdry.title: Hexadecagon
bawdry.short: A wooden polyhedron with rude curses.
bawdry.description: You can just throw it away or make a wish for someone you know.
bawdry.sudjestion: ТNow you can tell someone what the caller thinks about him!
bawdry.legend:
You found this toy under the bed of your small room, which you rent in the attic from the grumpy carpenter Marcus.


The local children in the yard say that they have such toys too. Marcus makes such a toy every time he wants to take out his anger on his unworthy customers when they forget to pay him for his work on time.


Even though the toy contains nothing but curses, Marcus believes that it makes him kinder. At least he does not take out his anger on other people while he is busy making it.

lantern.title: Lantern
lantern.short: Hand lantern with multi-colored glass and a candle inside.
